name: Count The Strike
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK 2022.

In Count The Strike you have to roll the dice through 9 levels. 

  • In order for you to win, every cross total has to be 0
  • NEVER get below 0, or you will lose

How to play:

  • Use WASD or arrow keys to roll the dice
  • Space, Enter or mouse to click the buttons

PS.: Let me know if you would like more levels added after the Game Jam in an updated version in the comments below.

Have fun, regards
Free Time Dev
